column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Like this museum needs an other review!  Honestly though
column2: it is EPIC!!!!  You won't come across a finer museum in the US outside of NY. And frankly
column3: this one is more European feeling than the NY museums
column4: like a louvre or musee d'orsay.  To die for!!!!  Check it out even for an hour!  Don't miss this museum.
